com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls.Control
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Editable, TableView

    public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    Major class for all control objects. All other control classes should be extended from this class.
    Author:
    Mykola Kolisnyk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Control(Page parentValue, org.openqa.selenium.By locatorValue)
      Default constructor which binds page the control belongs to and the locator to find the element on page.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Control

        public Control(Page parentValue,
               org.openqa.selenium.By locatorValue)
        Default constructor which binds page the control belongs to and the locator to find the element on page.
        Parameters:
        parentValue - the instance of the page class containing current control.
        locatorValue - the string used to locate current control.

      • getFormat

        public java.lang.String getFormat()
        Gets the string which can be used in custom controls when the data is to be retrieved based on some specific format (e.g. date, duration).
        Returns:
        format string.

      • setFormat

        public void setFormat(java.lang.String formatValue)
        Sets the string which can be used in custom controls when the data is to be retrieved based on some specific format (e.g. date, duration).
        Parameters:
        formatValue - format string.

      • isExcludeFromSearch

        public boolean isExcludeFromSearch()
        Defines whether current control is supposed to be excluded from search while using Page#isCurrent(long) method.
        Returns:
        exclude from search flag.

      • setExcludeFromSearch

        public void setExcludeFromSearch(boolean excludeFromSearchValue)
        Sets the state whether current control is supposed to be excluded from search while using Page#isCurrent(long) method.
        Parameters:
        excludeFromSearchValue - exclude from search flag.

      • addSubItems

        public void addSubItems(SubItem[] items)
        Adds sub-items assigned using SubItem annotation.

        items - sub-items to add.

      • element

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element()
        Gets direct reference to the WebElement instance for current control object.
        Returns:
        direct reference to the WebElement instance.

      • element

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element(int index)
        Gets direct reference to the WebElement instance for current control object. Unlike element(), this method is applicable when multiple elements can match the same locator. In this case the index is used to define which element from the array of possible options should be taken.
        Parameters:
        index - element index.
        Returns:
        direct reference to the WebElement instance.

      • waitUntil

        public boolean waitUntil(org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition<?> condition,
                         long timeout)
        Common method for various actions waiting for some element event to happen.
        Parameters:
        condition - the expected condition predicate.
        timeout - the time limit to wait for event to happen.
        Returns:
        true if condition is met, false - otherwise.
